Package zad

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • zad.Hand
  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Card functionality for a card hand of a Blackjack game
    Author:
    kiszkot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hand()
      Creates an empty hand with no cards.
      Hand​(Card[] hand)
      Creates a Hand with given Cards of the array

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCard​(Card card)
      Adds a card to the hand
      int handValue()
      Calculates the value of the hand.
      Card houseCard()
      Gets the first card of the hand.
      boolean isSame()
      Checks if the first two card in the Hand have the same value.
      java.lang.String previewHouse()
      Previews the first card of the hand.
      Hand split()
      Splits the hand into two hands.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string of the cards in the hand divided by a whitespace.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hand

        public Hand()
        Creates an empty hand with no cards.

      • Hand

        public Hand​(Card[] hand)
        Creates a Hand with given Cards of the array
        Parameters:
        hand - Array of Cards

    • Method Detail

      • handValue

        public int handValue()
        Calculates the value of the hand. If Aces are present and value is greater than 21 it recalculates.
        Returns:
        int The value of the hand

      • addCard

        public void addCard​(Card card)
        Adds a card to the hand
        Parameters:
        card - The card to be added

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string of the cards in the hand divided by a whitespace.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String The cards in the hand

      • previewHouse

        public java.lang.String previewHouse()
        Previews the first card of the hand. Used to show one card of the House in a Blackjack game
        Returns:
        String The first card of the hand

      • houseCard

        public Card houseCard()
        Gets the first card of the hand. Used to get the first card of the House in a Blackjack game.
        Returns:
        Card The first card of the hand

      • isSame

        public boolean isSame()
        Checks if the first two card in the Hand have the same value. Used to allow splitting in a Blackjack game.
        Returns:
        boolean TRUE if same, FALSE if not

      • split

        public Hand split()
        Splits the hand into two hands. Used to split the first two given cards in a Blackjack game
        Returns:
        Hand with the second card of the original Hand
